mapper.update: update library set lib_name = #{lib_name}, lib_region = #{lib_region}, lib_dtl_region = #{lib_dtl_region}, lib_address = #{lib_address}, lib_tel = #{lib_tel}, lib_fax=#{lib_fax}, lib_latitude=#{lib_latitude},lib_longitude=#{lib_longitude}, lib_homepage=#{lib_homepage}, lib_closed=#{lib_closed},lib_operating_time=#{lib_operating_time}, lib_bookcount=#{lib_bookcount} where id = #{lib_code};
mapper.select: select * from library order by lib_code desc
